Song.title: I See the Cross
Song.copyright: Brian Doerkson, Â©2000 Vineyard Songs Canada (Admin by Music Services) ION Publishing (Admin. by Vineyard Music USA)

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: I see the cr[E]oss and it's [A2]all I need to see I see the c[C#m]ross and it c[A2]alls me to believe
Chorus: No other w[E]ay to be r[B]econciled To rec[A2]eive complete forgiveness No other ch[E]oice could have s[B]et us free Could have p[A2]aid the price of justice [F#m]So I come [E/G#]as I am To the pl[A]ace where mercy [Bsus]meets me[B] I see the cr[E]oss [B/D# A2 B] I see the cr[E5]oss [B/D# A2 B]
Verse 2: I see the cr[E]oss lifted h[A2]igh for all to see I see the c[C#m]ross it's the l[A2]ove the nations need
Chorus: No other w[E]ay to be r[B]econciled To rec[A2]eive complete forgiveness No other ch[E]oice could have s[B]et us free Could have p[A2]aid the price of justice [F#m]So I come [E/G#]as I am To the pl[A]ace where mercy [Bsus]meets me[B] I see the cr[E]oss [B/D# A2 B] I see the cr[E5]oss [B/D# A2 B]
{new_page} BRIDGE: [F#m] You [E/G#]suffered and [A2]died p[B]oured out Your [F#m]life You s[E/G#]howed us the w[A2]ay to tr[B]uly be [F#m]great Yet [E/G#]this just beg[A2]ins the F[B]ather's full [F#m]plan Now [E/G#]there is a w[A2]ay to sh[B]are in Your r[E5]esurr[B/D#]ection To l[A2]ive fore[B]ver thr[E5]ough Your [B/D#]death and l[A2]ife [B] To share Your r[E5]esurr[B/D#]ection to l[A2]ive fore[B]ver Thr[E5]ough Your [B/D#]death and l[A2]ife [B] I see the cr[E]oss [A2] I see the c[C#m]ross [A2]
ENDING: [B/D# A/C# B] I see the cr[E]oss [B/D# A/C# B] I see the cr[E]oss [B/D# A/C# B] I see the cr[E5]oss [B/D# A/C# B] (Resur-rection live forever) I see the cr[E5]oss [B/D# A2 B] (Through Your death and life) [(Repeat 3X)]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 i see the cross and its all i need to see i see the cross and it calls me to believe chorus no other way to be reconciled to receive complete forgiveness no other choice could have set us free could have paid the price of justice so i come as i am to the place where mercy meets me i see the cross i see the cross verse 2 i see the cross lifted high for all to see i see the cross its the love the nations need chorus no other way to be reconciled to receive complete forgiveness no other choice could have set us free could have paid the price of justice so i come as i am to the place where mercy meets me i see the cross i see the cross bridge you suffered and died poured out your life you showed us the way to truly be great yet this just begins the fathers full plan now there is a way to share in your resurrection to live forever through your death and life to share your resurrection to live forever through your death and life i see the cross i see the cross ending i see the cross i see the cross i see the cross resurrection live forever i see the cross through your death and life
